<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/{realm}/orgs/{orgId}/domains/{domainName}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get details for a domain owned by an organization

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"orgId","description":"organization id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"domainName","description":"domain name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
